mapper.insert: insert into MAILCHECK(MAIL_TITLE, MAIL_CONTENT, MAIL_PW, MAIL_DATE, MAIL_SENDER, MAIL_RECEIVER, MAIL_CUSTOMER) values(#{mail_title},#{mail_content},#{mail_pw},now(),#{mail_sender},#{mail_receiver},#{mail_customer})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MAILCHECK WHERE MAIL_CUSTOMER = #{name} AND MAIL_RECEIVER = #{email} ORDER BY MAIL_NUM DESC LIMIT 1
select mem_id, mem_date from member where mem_name = #{findName} and mem_email = #{mail_receiver}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PW = #{changeNum} WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{email} AND MEM_NAME = #{name}
